name: Classic British Motor Racing
overview: An array of high performance classic cars to choose from including Austin Mini, Austin-Healy, MG, Rover and Triumph. Designed to please Classic Motor fans! Each car is accurately recreated under licence and feature the real handling characteristics of the vehicles. This is your chance to own and drive a piece of British Motor Racing heritage. 13 classic cars to choose from including; Austin Mini Cooper, MGB, Triumph TR6, Austin Healey 3000 and the Triumph Spitfire. Race through 6 different courses across the British Isles, featuring the heart stopping thrills of the traditional 'Westminster Run' around the streets of London. Excel and you'll be able to unlock 3 action packed game modes including Time Trial and Grand Prix. Try and beat the track records or race against friends in the insanely addictive multiplayer mode.
